title.en: Merched y Wawr Lampeter Branch celebrates in the 1970s
title.cy: Merched y Wawr Llanbedr Pont Steffan a'r Cylch yn Dathlu yn y 1970au

description.en:
Dathlu’r Nadolig neu Gwyl Ddewi yn yn 70au
Rhes Gefn: Barbara Jones; Lilian Band; Pamela Davies; Menna Evans; Dilys Jones.
Ail Res o’r Cefn: Nita Lewis; Mrs Jones, Rhoslwyn; Let Green; Fanw Jones; Mrs Davies, Bon Marche; Mrs Davies, Brynmeddyg; Mrs Hamer; Sadie Davies; Ray Morgan, Glandwr;  Eleanor Davies; Dilys James; Ray Williams; Mair Jones; Lil Jones.
3ydd Rhes o’r Cefn: Nel Williams; Idwen Gregory; Valerie Scott; Avril Williams; Dilwen Roderick; Marie James (Gwraig Wadd); Mary Jones; Ann Lewis;  Eryl Jones; Janet Evans; 
Rhes Flaen: Anita Williams; Beryl Davies; Eiryl Davies; Gwenda Richards; Beti Evans; Lettie Jones (Vaughan).
